venue.address_2: at InterContinental Boston which is located next to Boston Harbor Hotel
venue.name: Sushi-TEQ

item.description:
Sushi-TEQ is not a place for you if you are craving for something traditional. Their sushi style is quite eclectic and bold. They pair well with those yummy tequila cocktails!

Sushi-TEQ www.intercontinentalboston.com

SUSHI IS A HOT COMMODITY, OF SHALL WE SAY "RAW" COMMODITY, that has become an entertaining, trendy dining experience. SUSHI-TEQ at InterContinental Boston is the first of its kind to marry the tasteful and tantalizing delicacies of sushi with the agave spirit, tequila, creating sexy attitude, or better said "Sexitude." InterContinental Boston's lively salsa bar featuring innovative sushi concepts paired with vintage tequilas, margaritas and Cocktail Especials will offer only the highest quality tequilas from around the world and freshly squeezed lime juice served by sultry salsa waitresses. Smooth buttery Hamachi yellowtail meets Senor Don Julio at the slick and contemporary salsa bar.
------------------------------From WHERE TO EAT and Drink book

Closest MBTA: Red Line- South Station
Blue Line- Aquarium

Price Range: $10 - $18

Dress Code: Chic to Classic

I'm sorry to limit the number of people so small. Hey, you can become an organizer and throw selfish and intimate gatherings too! : P
Only the lucky ones who RSVP quickly get to hold the place!

You are responsible for what you had. We won't split the tab equally. The place is kind of pricey so you need to bring a pile of cash, or eat lightly before you come!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in front of the place before we go in. I'll let you know how to find Tamami later.
item.why: Sushi-TEQ is an Asian & Latino fusion bar located within InterContinental Boston. The place is sizzling "hot"! It is one of Mr. Oga's production who is THE renewoned Japanese chef in Boston( some of my fussy Japanese friends only eat sushi he makes)
item.name: Sushi & Tequila
